definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)
to roll (up)/to sweep up/to carry on/roll
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]
knife/blade/single-edged sword/cutlass/CL:把[ba3]/(slang) dollar (loanword)/classifier for sets of one hundred sheets (of paper)/classifier for knife cuts or stabs

sentences.english: Shanghai Friendship Pencil Sharpener Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海友谊卷笔刀有限公司。

sentences.english: Because I borrowed her pencil sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 就因为我向她借了卷笔刀。

sentences.english: Can a pencil sharpener’s design be improved?
sentences.chinese: 卷笔刀的设计还能改进吗？

sentences.english: Nobody else has a pencil sharpener.
Pick up the sharpener which is lying on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 把地上的卷笔刀捡起来。

sentences.english: The sharpener on the desk is mine.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上的卷笔刀是我的。

sentences.english: What shape is the pencil sharpener? It's a star.
sentences.chinese: 这个卷笔刀是什么形状的？是星形的。

sentences.english: The pencil sharpener is for my brother.
sentences.chinese: 这个卷笔刀是给我兄弟的。

sentences.english: What's this in your pencil box? It's a pencil sharpener.
sentences.chinese: 你文具盒里这是什么？是卷笔刀。

sentences.english: This is perhaps the coolest pencil sharpener ever to walk on its own.
sentences.chinese: 这也许是最酷的卷笔刀以往自己行走。

sentences.english: Yes, I want two sharpeners, please.
This is a pencil sharpener it?

definition: the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
stationery/item of stationery (pen, pencil, eraser, pencil sharpener etc)
